metadata.text: Best And Superfast App...But, not working properly from the last month. I can scan any barcode and make the payment through it. But, when opt for mobile transfer to any person, my keyboard does not pop up. Not at all. Please help, as I tried everything. I cleared its data, cache, and even unistalled & reinstalled the app. But, all in vain. I have not been able to understand the problem even after looking for it on google & Youtube.😃
issues: The app is not working properly from the last month.
Keyboard does not pop up when opting for mobile transfer to any person.
reasons: The review mentions issues related to payment processing and UPI payments, which fall under the scope of the Payments Team.
The review mentions UI/UX issues, which align with the scope of the User Interface and User Experience Team.

metadata.text: Hi, After the last update, I'm not able to open the app. When I click on the login id, the UI disappear's and close the application. Kindly fix the issue ASAP. Secondly, the experience was excellent and swift before, but the cash back is very low. Everyone needs cash backs instead of irrelevant vouchers and coupons. Kindly bring these fixes ASAP. Keep growing guys. Thank you google pay.!!
issues: I'm not able to open the app after the last update.

detailed_issues.issue: I'm not able to open the app after the last update.

reasons: The issue is related to the app's user interface and user experience, which falls under the scope of the User Interface and User Experience Team.

metadata.replyContent: Regret the inconvenience, Arunava. We suggest you contact our specialist team for assistance on this: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc. Our team would be happy to help.
metadata.text: I keep giving the correct pin, but it says incorrect pin, and locks me out of opening the app. Even when I carefully input each digit. It is really frustrating not being able to open the app. And not like I have already tried multiple wrong tries, it just starts doing this on a whim. Extremely unreliable.
issues: The app says incorrect pin even when the correct pin is entered.
The app locks me out of opening it after entering the correct pin.
The app is extremely unreliable.

detailed_issues.issue: The app says incorrect pin even when the correct pin is entered.
The app locks me out of opening it after entering the correct pin.

reasons: The issue of 'Transaction Security' and 'Fraud Detection' aligns with the scope of work of the Security and Fraud Prevention Team.
The issue of 'UI Design / Fix' matches with the scope of work of the User Interface and User Experience Team.

metadata.text: Very impressive! Although there is a problem with the application, the transaction are excellent. My phone keeps making notification noises even after I disable them. It's annoying that I get too many alerts in one day. I ask that someone on the development team take care of this issue. Positively, I like the app's user interface, ease of use, and top-notch customer support. Queries are answered quickly, and the crew provides solutions right away. The app is well-structured, easy to use.
issues: My phone keeps making notification noises even after I disable them.

detailed_issues.issue: My phone keeps making notification noises even after I disable them.

reasons: The issue relates to mobile recharges and bill payments, which falls under the scope of work of the Recharges and Bill Payments Team.
The issue might involve a user interface problem causing the notification noises, which falls under the scope of work of the User Interface and User Experience Team.

metadata.text: This app is are great, although there hasn't been a single font update over the years, but for older phone versions, clean and just so smooth it does the job quite well. but having to watch two 30 seconds ads every single time you want to use it for free for a single day, is just pure dumb. we should get at le ast 2-3 fronts for free and have an option to watch ads if we need more, it makes it so much easier that way. also, some ads are unquitable, i cannot quit many of those ads never.

Better than other apps. I can't use the app with the current changes. Previous Review Very good banking software that does it everything. I adore this application. If the PPF account can also be examined, it would be fantastic. The user interface is quite intuitive, and the application is light and quick. I've watched this software develop from a basic version with limited features to the robust version it is today. far superior to its rival banking apps.

detailed_issues.issue: I can't use the app with the current changes.

metadata.text: Google payis my go-to UPI app for all my digital transactions. It's incredibly user-friendly, allowing me to send and receive money effortlessly. The interface is intuitive, making navigation a breeze. What I appreciate most is its reliability; transactions are swift and secure. Plus, the app offers a range of services like bill payments and recharge options, making it a one-stop solution for all my financial needs. Highly recommended! Love you phone pay

It has been over three years since the Flutter-based version was released, yet the app still feels very sluggish and jittery even on a flagship phone, especially during scrolling. However, I really like the fact it stores transaction history indefinitely, and doesn't hide the VPA of online merchants in transaction history, which PhonePe is notorious for. It would have been great if you could add an option to copy transaction details to clipboard.
issues: the app still feels very sluggish and jittery even on a flagship phone, especially during scrolling

detailed_issues.issue: the app still feels very sluggish and jittery even on a flagship phone, especially during scrolling

reasons: The review mentions UI performance issues, which falls under the scope of User Interface and User Experience Team

metadata.text: Google Pay has revolutionized the way the people manage their finances! From seamless transactions to earning rewards, this app has it all. The user-friendly interface makes sending and receiving money a breeze, and the security features provide peace of mind. Plus, the ability to pay bills and split expenses with friends simplifies my life. I highly recommend GPay to anyone looking for a convenient and reliable payment solution.

It is always good! This app is fantastic and ideal for anyone trying to take quality photos. It produces crisp images and does a fantastic job capturing them. I'm giving it five stars since it merits praise for enabling this. There are no advertisements that might cause a disruption either. For those who are interested in themes, this program also contains lovely features. It is simple to use and has the potential to improve any app. People will find it to be of great use.

Best And Superfast App...But, not working properly from the last month. I can scan any barcode and make the payment through it. But, when opt for mobile transfer to any person, my keyboard does not pop up. Not at all. Please help, as I tried everything. I cleared its data, cache, and even unistalled & reinstalled the app. But, all in vain. I have not been able to understand the problem even after looking for it on google & Youtube.😃
reasons: The issue related to Payment Gateway and Payment Processing can be handled by Payments Team.
The issue related to Mobile Recharges and Utility Bill Payments can be handled by Recharges and Bill Payments Team.
issues: The app is not working properly from the last month.
My keyboard does not pop up when opting for mobile transfer to any person.

Keep growing guys. Thank you google pay.!!

Plus, the app offers a range of services like bill payments and recharge options, making it a one-stop solution for all my financial needs. Highly recommended! Love you phone pay

metadata.text: Google Pay has revolutionized the way the people manage their finances! From seamless transactions to earning rewards, this app has it all. The user-friendly interface makes sending and receiving money a breeze, and the security features provide peace of mind. Plus, the ability to pay bills and split expenses with friends simplifies my life. I highly recommend GPay to anyone looking for a convenient and reliable payment solution.

It is always good! This app is fantastic and ideal for anyone trying to take quality photos. It produces crisp images and does a fantastic job capturing them. I'm giving it five stars since it merits praise for enabling this. There are no advertisements that might cause a disruption either. For those who are interested in themes, this program also contains lovely features. It is simple to use and has the potential to improve any app. People will find it to be of great use.

Everything is fine. But, recently I got an issue like my transaction is failed due to network issue. And in the transaction history the status is failed. But my money got debited from the bank account and I didn't got any message like money got debited,but when I check my balance the money got debited. Then, I raised a ticket. They said the money will be credited within 3days. Now, they are asking for the bank statement after 3 days. I really don't like this feature. Please fix this.
reasons: The issue of failed transactions and debited money aligns with the scope of work of Payments Team which includes Payment Gateway, Payment Processing, and Transaction Security.
The issue of customer support and bank statement aligns with the scope of work of Loans and Banking Team which includes Loan Management and Bank Account Integration.
issues: My transaction failed due to a network issue and my money got debited without any notification.
The customer support team asked for my bank statement after 3 days of raising the ticket.
I am unsatisfied with the current feature of not receiving notifications for debited money.

metadata.text: One of the most unreliable apps on the store. Has given me so much pain. Online transactions fail all the time. Money gets debited but transaction fails at the vendor end then I have to spend time running behind the bank (Google Pay doesn't take up any responsibility) and the vendor. Can't rely on it to pay for quick transactions like cab/auto fares because it fails at the most critical points and you are left scrambling. Planning to move completely to other UPI apps.
reasons: The Payments Team is responsible for Payment Gateway, Payment Processing, and Payment Reconciliation, which are directly related to online transaction failures and money debited but transaction fails at the vendor end.
The Security and Fraud Prevention Team handles Transaction Security and Fraud Detection, which are crucial in addressing issues related to failed transactions and potential fraud.
issues: Online transactions fail all the time.
Money gets debited but transaction fails at the vendor end then I have to spend time running behind the bank (Google Pay doesn't take up any responsibility) and the vendor.

metadata.text: I loved this app....!!!! In my experience of using the app for all kinds of payments and others, the performance is outstanding and smooth. The app layout and interface is very impressive. The cash back points for various payments is an added bonus. Kudos to the App team. However a small point to note for improvement. When the phone is on mobile data and not on wifi, a pop up appears frequently at the bottom saying " No internet available". So everytime it has to be clicked and removed....!
reasons: The issue relates to 'UPI Payments' and 'Bill Payments' which fall under the scope of the Payments Team.
The issue is about 'Mobile Recharges' and 'Utility Bill Payments' which are handled by the Recharges and Bill Payments Team.
issues: When the phone is on mobile data and not on wifi, a pop up appears frequently at the bottom saying 'No internet available'. So everytime it has to be clicked and removed.

metadata.text: Unique features are very interesting. The Fastest And Greatest App...But for the past month, it hasn't been functioning properly. I am able to use any barcode to scan and process payments. But my keyboard does not appear when I want to transfer money to someone via mobile. Not at all. Help, please; I've tried everything. I deleted the app's data and cache and even uninstalled and reloaded it. But, all in vain. Even after searching Google and YouTube, I still can't seem to grasp the issue.
reasons: The issue related to Payment Gateway, Payment Processing, and UPI Payments falls under the scope of work of Payments Team.
The issue related to Transaction Security and Fraud Detection aligns with the scope of work of Security and Fraud Prevention Team.
The issue related to UI Design / Fix and UX Fix / Research matches the scope of work of User Interface and User Experience Team.
issues: The app hasn't been functioning properly for the past month.
Keyboard does not appear when transferring money via mobile.
Unable to grasp the issue even after searching Google and YouTube.

metadata.text: I like how easily the payments can be done in some cases. However most of the time when making bank payments, it shows trouble. Whenever you want to make a payment two in a row it stops. Also, the cashback and reward were good first but now they are not useful, relevant or good. The four offers you get after payment are all bad and not useful. Plus, they say to complete tasks for cashback and even if you do that, you won't get the offered cashback. So you can only use it for small payments.
reasons: Bank payments fall under the scope of 'Payment Gateway' and 'UPI Payments' handled by Payments Team.
Bank payments align with the scope of 'Bank Account Integration' managed by Loans and Banking Team.
issues: Bank payments show trouble most of the time.
Making two payments in a row stops the process.

metadata.replyContent: Don't worry, Irbaz. This happens sometime due to heavy traffic on bank servers. We suggest trying again after a couple of hours. Thanks for being patient.
metadata.text: Since the last few days I've ran through some new issue which never occured before. I tried to reset my Pin and somehow it interfaces with a statement "something went wrong with the bank servers". Although this could be an issue with the Bank but I believe that if the developers take a deeper look into this app, then the issue could potentially be resolved. Hope you'll look forward into this.
reasons: The review mentions an issue with bank servers, which falls under the scope of work of Loans and Banking Team in terms of Bank Account Integration.
The review indicates a problem with transaction security and potential fraud, aligning with the scope of work of Security and Fraud Prevention Team.
issues: I've ran through some new issue which never occured before.
something went wrong with the bank servers

metadata.text: I have been a user of Google Pay for a considerable period, but recently, my experience has been less than satisfactory. For the past month, Google Pay has been consistently showing a 'Something went wrong' error during bank transactions. This issue is specific to Google Pay, as other payment apps work fine. Disappointing, considering its previous reliability.
reasons: The Payments Team is responsible for Payment Gateway, Payment Processing, and Merchant Transactions which are related to bank transactions. They can investigate the 'Something went wrong' error during bank transactions.
The Loans and Banking Team handles Bank Account Integration which is related to bank transactions. They can look into the 'Something went wrong' error during bank transactions.
issues: Google Pay consistently showing a 'Something went wrong' error during bank transactions

metadata.replyContent: Regret the inconvenience, Kshitij. We suggest you contact our specialist team for assistance on this: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc. Our team would be happy to help.
metadata.text: I keep getting "Something went wrong" error while trying to add my Visa credit card for tap and pay. The worst part is it won't even tell me exactly what went wrong. This is so stupid. Have a clear error message at least! I've tried updating the app, clearing the data and cache as well but nothing seems to work. This is a pathetic experience!!! Fix it asap.
reasons: The issue is related to Payment Gateway and Payment Processing, which falls under the scope of work of Payments Team.
The issue involves Transaction Security and Fraud Detection, which are within the scope of work of Security and Fraud Prevention Team.
issues: Getting "Something went wrong" error while trying to add Visa credit card for tap and pay
Tried updating the app, clearing data and cache but issue persists

metadata.text: To view your card info you have to open up chrome and go to autofill. If you want to adjust payment settings you need to go the Google app instead. But if you want to tap-to-pay you use google wallet, but if you want to view your transactions you have to use this pointless app. Google took the concept of uncomplicated, convenient, and all in one place, and said "let's do the polar opposite!" Half of google searches are just people troubleshooting stupid issues that Google itself created

If I could rate 10 stars I would. I can't say enough good things about Cash App! I use it for all my banking needs. I get paid 3 days early, I save money with roundups, my ATM fees are reimbursed and now I have $50 free overdraft protection! Love this app more than PayPal or Venmo. So easy to send and receive $. No waiting for verification or anything. And almost everyone is on cash app. Super easy to look people up whether or not they are on your contact list

metadata.replyContent: Regret the inconvenience, Dropti. We suggest you contact our specialist team for assistance on this: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc. Our team would be happy to help.
metadata.text: It won't work, for HPSCB, I've tried everything. It won't let me add any UPI IDs, I even waited for 4 days, kept trying and trying. The payments won't go through. Eventually I just got tired. I've used this app for like 5 years now, and this is the first time it's failed me. Maybe it's the bank, idk man. I feel very frustrated and disappointed. Not to mention the time I wasted waiting.
reasons: The review mentions issues related to Payment Gateway, Payment Processing, and UPI Payments which fall under the scope of work of the Payments Team.
The review mentions issues related to Transaction Security and Fraud Detection which fall under the scope of work of the Security and Fraud Prevention Team.
issues: It won't work for HPSCB, I've tried everything.
It won't let me add any UPI IDs.
The payments won't go through.
Maybe it's the bank, idk man.

metadata.replyContent: Regret the inconvenience, Ravi. Our team is already working on resolving this at the earliest. We suggest you try again after a few hours. For further assistance, reach out to our support team. Here's how: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc.
metadata.text: The bank account gets Unlinked automatically. I have two different bank accounts and tried linking only one each time but the account is getting Unlinked and I've been promoted to add bank account again and again. There is no proper support to have this resolved which is indeed frustrating.
reasons: The issue of bank account getting unlinked automatically falls under the scope of work of the Loans and Banking Team, specifically in the area of Bank Account Integration.

The issue of transaction security and fraud detection may also be relevant in the context of the bank account getting unlinked automatically, hence can be assigned to the Security and Fraud Prevention Team.
issues: The bank account gets unlinked automatically.

metadata.text: Useless App! Too many steps to use a card. In the last 3 weeks I haven't found a merchant that even accepts Google Pay. I have 3 gift cards that I can't access or use. They're digital gift cards and everytime I go to use one, I have to shuffle through emails to find the CV codes. It's embarrassing when you're trying to pay in-store. Customer service doesn't know what to do. I've removed all my cards except my gift cards.

This app is good only for payments. But the reward system is the worst. It's a SCAM. Always gives" better luck next time". I have been getting this reward since my payment level reached 250. Now I have reached 459, still getting " better luck next time". Very disappointed with this reward system. Most of the rewards will be useless. it's better, if they stop luring the ppl with useless rewards

Discover seamless payments and effortless bill splitting with Google Pay. Pay for everyday purchases with a tap and easily split bills among friends. However, ensure unpaid amounts after bill splitting are visible and manageable, as they sometimes get buried in the transaction list. Adding a feature to send reminders for unpaid shares would greatly enhance user experience. Simplify your finances, track transactions, and stay on budget with our intuitive interface
reasons: The Payments Team handles Payment Reconciliation which involves tracking unpaid shares, making them suitable for handling reminders for unpaid shares.
The Recharges and Bill Payments Team deals with Utility Bill Payments, which is similar to tracking unpaid shares for reminders.
issues: Adding a feature to send reminders for unpaid shares would greatly enhance user experience.

metadata.text: Self defeating. Half the time it asks for my CVC number when I go to use the card, which I use the app to not have to carry all my cards. If I have the card I'll just use the card. They can claim its for security all they want but my phone has biometric locks plus you need a pin to get in to pay anything, so it's just them deciding to be difficult.

Reliable app. One suggestion... Till previous app version, we can filter the transaction history based on payment type, mode, month. Seems this is removed now. If this option is available, it will be highly helpful.

On April 15th, one of payment got stuck due to server issue, amount got debited from my account but it's showing in process. Since then after raising the issue ticket, my bank account is automatically getting delinked from the app and now when iam trying Activate my bank account again it's showing sms sending error. What to do ? Why Its frequently happening? Is this the issue with new update? Whom to contact?
reasons: Payment Gateway and Payment Processing fall under Payments Team's scope of work
Bank Account Integration aligns with Loans and Banking Team's scope of work
Transaction Security and Fraud Detection are part of Security and Fraud Prevention Team's scope of work
issues: One of payment got stuck due to server issue
Amount got debited from my account but it's showing in process
Bank account is automatically getting delinked from the app
Trying to activate bank account again shows sms sending error
Frequently happening issues
Issue with new update

metadata.text: A really well designed and sought out app. Only slight issue i think for me is that I'm not comfortable sharing my phone number whilst sending or receiving money. Phone numbers should be kept as a secret. Searching someone you need to pay or receive money, should be soley done with UPI IDs. Phone numbers can be a sensitive information which many of us aren't comfortable sharing it. Please, take a look at this Google

Worst experience with payment related issues. I have 2 call recordings in which you can clearly get to know how fraudulent this app is.  In the 1st call they mentioned You'll get your money within 48 hours.  In the 2'nd call they mentioned you will get an update regarding your payment in 3 days.  They are changing their statements in both the calls  Don't know when I will get my own money, but I'll definitely not recommend this app.  Fraud app ever
reasons: The Payments Team is suitable for issues related to Payment Gateway, Payment Processing, and Fraud Detection.
The Security and Fraud Prevention Team is a good fit for handling Fraudulent app and Fraud Detection issues.
issues: Worst experience with payment related issues.
Fraudulent app with changing statements regarding payment.
Uncertainty about receiving own money.
Not recommended due to fraudulent nature of the app.
